general.security: This information is kept confidential and secure as required by law. <1>Learn more</1>

preregistration.byline: This site will help you apply for disaster-related food assistance (D-SNAP).

body: You are not already participating in a food assistance program like SNAP (If you are, read this)
You lived in one of these areas from [benefit period start date] to [benefit period end date]: [affected county1], [affected county2], [affected county3], [affected county4]
The disaster damaged your home or self-employment property, delayed, reduced, or stopped your income, caused you to lose food, or created any additional expense for your household
Your household plans to buy food between [benefit period start date] and [benefit period end date]

language.error: Please select a language before continuing.

preparation.header: Before you apply, we'll need some info.
preparation.byline: This will help us get you benefits faster.

body: You and your household, addresses, and date of birth
Phone number to follow-up, which helps you get benefits quicker
Money from jobs or other sources, and employer info

immigrants.apply: Applying for these programs will not affect your or your family's immigration status.
immigrants.benefit: If you or someone in your household is not a citizen, you may still be able to receive some benefits.
immigrants.reassure: We ask about citizenship so that we can help you find out what programs you qualify for.

firstName.label: What is your legal first name?
firstName.explanation: As shown on legal documents such as a birth certificate. This helps us verify who you are.

addresses.header: Where did you live on the date the disaster struck?

currentMailingAddress.label: Is this where you currently receive mail?

phone.label: What is your phone number?
phone.explanation: This is the best way for us to follow-up regarding your application.

email.label: What is your email address, if you have one?

offramp.header: Great start, {{ customerName }}! Let’s keep going.
offramp.copy: You are legally allowed to submit your application with your name and address. This will take longer as we will mail you the rest of the paperwork to complete.

alerts.success: It will be easier and faster to finish applying online now.

offramp.link: Stop working now and submit application now

personalInfo.header: Now, a few more questions about you.

dob.label: What is your date of birth?

stateId.label: What is your driver's license or state ID number?
stateId.explanation: You can leave this blank if you don't know it or don't have one. Providing one will help verify and move you faster in the application process.

ssn.label: What is your Social Security Number (SSN)?
ssn.explanation: You can leave this blank if you don't know it or don't have one. Providing one will help verify and move you faster in the application process.

sex.label: Sex?
sex.explanation: As shown in legal documents such as a birth certificate.

whyAsk.copy:
We use your Social Security Number to check information about to find out what you qualify for as we go through these steps.
 With your Social Security Number, we may be able to sign you up for services today.
 You do not have to provide your Social Security Number right now, but if you choose not to, you will be asked to provide documents that prove things like your income sources.

count.header: Now tell us about people you share food with.
count.label: On [first day of benefit period], how many people in your home did you regularly buy food for and prepare meals with?
count.explanation: Count your roommates if you often buy food and cook together.

memberNames.header: OK {{ customerName }}, you share meals with {{ count }} people.

getPrepared.header: Now, we'll need some info about each person.

conditions.header: We’ll ask about the following from the people you listed so far:

memberDetails.header: Great! Let’s get more info about {{ firstName }}.

dob.label: What is {{ firstName }}'s date of birth?

ssn.label: What is {{ firstName }}'s Social Security Number (SSN)?
ssn.explanation: You can leave this blank if you don't know it or if they don't have one. Providing one will help verify and move you faster in the application process.

sex.label: What is {{ firstName }}'s sex?
sex.explanation: As shown in legal documents such as a birth certificate.

foodAssistance.header: We need to ask you about food assistance
foodAssistance.label: Check all people who receive food assistance

impact.header: Now, tell us how you were impacted by the disaster.

buyFood.label: Has your household bought food or plan to buy food between [benefit period start date] and [benefit period end date]?

lostOrInaccessibleIncome.label: Did the disaster delay, reduce, or stop your income or the income of any of the other members of your household?

inaccessibleMoney.label: Are you or any other member of your household unable to access some of your money?

otherExpenses.label: What expenses caused by the disaster did your household pay or expect to pay between [benefit period start date] and [benefit period end date]?
otherExpenses.error: Please enter an amount for this expense.
otherExpenses.foodLoss: Food lost or spoiled during disaster
otherExpenses.medical: Medical expenses due to personal injury
otherExpenses.itemReplacement: Expenses related to replacing necessary personal and household items, such as clothing, appliances, tools, and educational materials

resources.header: We need to ask you some money questions.

moneyOnHand.label: How much money do you have on hand today?
moneyOnHand.explanation: Give your best estimate. This includes money in checking accounts, savings accounts, and any other cash you have available. Do not include income you recieved between [disaster start date] and [disaster end date].

incomeRecipients.label: Who received income between [benefit period start date] and [benefit period end date]?

assetsAndIncome.header: Now, tell us about {{ firstName }}’s income during the disaster.

incomeSources.label: Check all sources of income {{ firstName }} received between [benefit period start date] and [benefit period end date].
incomeSources.hasJobs: {{ firstName }} has one or more jobs
incomeSources.otherSources: {{ firstName }} has other sources of income

pay.label: How much take home pay did {{ firstName }} receive from this job between [disaster start date] and [disaster end date]?

stateAgency.label: Is this employer a state agency?
